class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut.sort()
        verticalCut.sort()
        hs, vs = sum(horizontalCut), sum(verticalCut)
        hi, vi = 1, 1
        ans = 0
        while len(horizontalCut) and len(verticalCut):
            if horizontalCut[-1] > verticalCut[-1]:
                ans += horizontalCut[-1] * vi
                hi += 1
                horizontalCut.pop()
            else:
                ans += verticalCut[-1] * hi
                vi += 1
                verticalCut.pop()
        ans += sum(horizontalCut) * vi + sum(verticalCut) * hi
        return ans
